title: The Turbulent ocean
creator_credit: Bert Shapiro and MIT (Massachusetts Institute of Technology)
brief_description: A documentary film about oceanography - trying to determine theoretical eddies, to predict turbulence and ocean storms. Also an ocean-going research study to find a mode-eddy - which they did.
creator_credit_for_label: Bert Shapiro and MIT (Massachusetts Institute of Technology)
description: A documentary film about oceanography - trying to determine theoretical eddies, to predict turbulence and ocean storms. Also an ocean-going research study to find a mode-eddy - which they did.
